txt.en: You have turned in a stack of trophies for a modest reward suitable for a collector such as yourself.
Wanted: Glistening filth from insects or spiders in the Barrow-downs or Old Forest. Deliver the items to Second-watcher Heathstraw at the Boar Fountain in Bree.
'I believe that this fulfills the request. Thank you.'
'Apparently, the requestor believes that they can make something out of the filth of insects and spiders.'
Men of Bree Task:  Glistening Filth
Second-watcher Heathstraw is offering compensation for the collection of glistening filth from insects and spiders in the Barrow-downs or Old Forest.
Deliver the glistening filth to Second-watcher Heathstraw

You have been tasked with finding glistening filth from insects and spiders in the Barrow-downs and Old Forest. Second-watcher Heathstraw awaits the delivery of these items at the Boar Fountain in Bree.
Wanted: Glistening filth from insects or spiders in the Barrow-downs or Old Forest.
